title: Arabic 5
text: Love Me, that I may love thee. If thou lovest Me not, My love can in no wise reach thee. Know this, O servant.

prev.title: Arabic 4
prev.text: I loved thy creation, hence I created thee. Wherefore, do thou love Me, that I may name thy name and fill thy soul with the spirit of life.

next.title: Arabic 6
next.text: Thy Paradise is My love; thy heavenly home, reunion with Me. Enter therein and tarry not. This is that which hath been destined for thee in Our kingdom above and Our exalted dominion.
